title: What is the big complaint?
creator_credit: Salvatore Greco and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The difficulty in dialogue when a traveller from Ontario knowing very little French, must ask directions, becomes the core of a pleasant little episode in Quebec. Included are several men on the street’s views about the situation in Quebec.
creator_credit_for_label: Salvatore Greco and National Film Board of Canada
